TopicTitle: Tweakables to set pitch/roll/yaw/up-down/foreward-back/left-right for RCS ports

Articles.Content: Just like how you can set pitch/roll/yaw functionality for control surfaces, it'd be useful to have similar options for RCS ports (with translation controls added as well).

Good one!

I support this idea.

It would make the linear ports more usefull too.

Yes, that would be really nice to have. Or better, to set up force in % to be applied by each port for each translation so they apply forces evenly and don't bend the ship.

But even better would probably be if the game did that automatically.
It already does for precision mode, afaik. That said, configurable thrust % like we already have in LFEs would be nice as well.

It already does that.

SAS forces it even on not precision mode (at least on my ship designs).

I think I remember hearing something about a command that allowed you to re-orient the Navball (and thus the RCS).

Never used it myself but if it exist you should find it on the Wiki.
